import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { User, Shield, Activity, LogOut, Plus, Eye, Clock, CheckCircle, XCircle, FileText, FileImage, FileArchive } from 'lucide-react'; import FileManager from './files/FileManager'; import { useWallet } from '../context/WalletContext'; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const { state, disconnectWallet, registerUser, getStoredFiles } = useWallet(); // Registration form is always shown when user is not registered const [registrationData, setRegistrationData] = useState({ username: '', email: '' }); const [isRegistering, setIsRegistering] = useState(false); const [fileCount, setFileCount] = useState(0); // Update file count when wallet account changes useEffect(() => { if (state.wallet.account) { const files = getStoredFiles(); setFileCount(files.length); } else { setFileCount(0); } }, [state.wallet.account, getStoredFiles]); // Debug logging console.log('Dashboard - isRegistered:', state.isRegistered, 'userProfile:', state.userProfile); const handleRegistration = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!registrationData.username || !registrationData.email) return; setIsRegistering(true); try { await registerUser(registrationData.username, registrationData.email); // Clear form data after successful registration setRegistrationData({ username: '', email: '' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Registration failed:', error); } finally { setIsRegistering(false); } }; const formatAddress = (address: string) => { return `${address.slice(0, 6)}...${address.slice(-4)}`; }; const mockAccessRequests = [ { id: 1, resource: 'Database', action: 'Read', timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), status: 'pending' }, { id: 2, resource: 'API Gateway', action: 'Write', timestamp: new Date(Date.now() - 86400000).toISOString(), status: 'approved' }, { id: 3, resource: 'File Storage', action: 'Delete', timestamp: new Date(Date.now() - 172800000).toISOString(), status: 'denied' } ]; const getStatusIcon = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return ; case 'denied': return ; default: return ; } }; const getStatusColor = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case 'approved': return 'text-green-400'; case 'denied': return 'text-red-400'; default: return 'text-yellow-400'; } }; return (
BSCIAM
Dashboard Files Activity

Dashboard

{!state.isRegistered ? (

Complete your registration

Please provide some additional information to complete your registration.

setRegistrationData({...registrationData, username: e.target.value})} required />
setRegistrationData({...registrationData, email: e.target.value})} required />
) : (
{/* Welcome Card */}
Welcome back, {state.userProfile?.username || 'User'}
{state.wallet.account ? formatAddress(state.wallet.account) : 'No wallet connected'}
{/* File Manager Section */}

Secure File Storage

Upload and manage your encrypted files. All files are encrypted before storage.

{/* Quick Stats */}
Access Level
Standard
Reputation
{state.userProfile?.reputationScore || 100}
Files Stored
{fileCount}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

Your recent access requests and activities.

    {mockAccessRequests.map((request) => (

  • {request.action} access to {request.resource}

    {request.status === 'pending' ? (

    Pending

    ) : request.status === 'approved' ? (

    Approved

    ) : (

    Rejected

    )}

    {new Date(request.timestamp).toLocaleString()}

    • ))}
)}
); }; export default Dashboard;
